content: > like the elbrook hat be sure to check out the elbrook cowl 1 as well and be on the lookout for the elbrook sweater testing call coming soon check my instagram > this pattern is knit with murky depths targhee worsted check it out here 2 you can get a hat and a cowl out of one skein of each color the elbrook hat is an instant-gratification colorwork sprint knit up in cozy worsted weight yarn highly recommend murky depth s targhee worsted this hat will be off your needles and on your head before you know it **sizes** finished measurements 18 75 20 75 22 5 / 47 5 52 5 57 cm circumference 9 25 10 11 / 23 5 25 5 28 cm from brim to crown this corresponds approximately to child women s and men s sizes sample is shown in size 2 **yarn** mc 110 125 135 yards / 125 135 145 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway kid glove 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein cc1 30 35 40 yards / 35 35 40 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway blood oath 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein cc2 30 35 40 yards / 35 35 40 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway dark slate 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein **needles and gauge** 4 / 10 cm = 17 sts and 24 row in stockinette blocked us size 6 and 8 needles used in the sample **supplies** stitch markers yarn needle techniques - tutorial links included in the pattern reading a colorwork chart latvian braid this pattern has been professionally tech edited - thank you sue-cat /people/sue-cat it has also been test knit thank you to my testers 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/elbrook-cowl 2 https //www etsy com/shop/murkydepths
